msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msItem.title: Siyar al-Muta'akhkhirin.
msItem.note: Upside down inside front, originally back, cover, crested bookplate of N.B. Edmonstone. A history of the Muhammadan power in India, from A.H. 1118 to 1195. Contains sections 1 and 2 of the work as described by Storey. Headings and punctuation in red.

listBibl.bibl: For Edmonstone's bequest see the donations register under November 6 1841, p. 408 and J.R.A.S., viii, Annual Report, p. x, Proceedings, p. xxxi.

bindingDesc.p: Half-leather European binding, with tooling on spince and blind-tooled edges. At some stage replace back to front and upside down,

origin.p: The date at the end, seven days before the end of Ramadan 1195, is that of the original composition and not of the copying.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
